# Callouts

> [!note] Title line
> Callout content line one.
> Callout content line two with **bold**.
> 
> - item one
> - item two
> 
> ```python
> print("inside callout")
> ```
> 
> <img src="figs/callout.svg" width="140">

> [!warning]
> Callout without explicit title.
> > Nested blockquote line.
